p: In order to establish the CIPN model, paclitaxel was administered intraperitoneally daily for 6 days. These 6 days are denoted as day 0–day 6. All the basal pain behaviors were assessed on day 0. Subsequently, hot plate assay was carried out on day 6, day 11, and day 16; tail flick and Von Frey assays on day 7, day 12, and day 17; and Randall–Selitto on day 9, day 13, and day 19.
